definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: Osean GAsk Attention, overhead aircraft, this is the ground forces.
sentences.chinese: 头上的航空部队，注意了，这里是地面部队。

sentences.english: In addition , paratroop assaults and airdrops can move ground forces and supplies .
sentences.chinese: 伞兵攻击和空投可以地面部队和用品。

sentences.english: Tactically, air bursts are the most likely to be used against ground forces.
sentences.chinese: 在战术上，空中爆炸最有可能用来对抗地面部队。

sentences.english: IDF troops mobilize on the Gaza - Israel border.
sentences.chinese: 以色列的地面部队在为最后的进攻作动员令。

sentences.english: Israeli ground troops reach the Litani River.
sentences.chinese: 以色列地面部队到达利塔尼河。

sentences.english: Soviet ground forces were quickly enveloped, cut off and destroyed in vast numbers.
sentences.chinese: 苏联地面部队迅速被包围，被切断并被大量歼灭。

definition: expeditionary force/army on a distant expedition
